mapper.insert: insert into project_payment (payment_id, company_id, project_id, period, file_voucher, file_pay_cert, status) values (#{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileVoucher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePayCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update project_payment set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_voucher = #{fileVoucher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_pay_cert = #{filePayCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select payment_id, company_id, project_id, period, file_voucher, file_pay_cert, status from project_payment
